title: Dungeon Siege - Legends of Aranna [PC game] RPG
description:
Dungeon Siege: Legends of Aranna. 12+ rated.
********************************************

Game for PC.
Expansion pack includes full version of Dungeon Siege.
Game type:- RPG [similar to RTS].
Copied DVD-ROM x 3 as image files.
No serial or fixes required.
Labelled:- Microsoft Games/XPLOSIV/mod doc SOFTWARE/GAS powered GAMES.


REQUIREMENTS.
************
98/2000/ME/XP.
333Mhz CPU.
128MB RAM.
1.6GB Hard disk space.


Master over 50 powerful weapons, armour sets, and spells to battle strange fearsome enemies including giant insects.


Delivered in rar folder contains:-
3 image files,[mdf/mds]
1 short avi video on how to install the game with Daemon Tools emulator,
1 text document.



Extract the 4 files from the rar folder and mount the image files with a virtual machine.
I recommend Daemon Tools emulator.



If you haven't got a rar extractor installed, download one from the link below, you can also download Daemon Tools there as well.
I recommend 7Zip.



Once 7Zip is installed, simply right click on the downloaded rar folder > 7Zip > extract here.
 <a href="
http://www.filehippo.com/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.filehippo.com/</a> 



ADVICE..NEVER DELETE RAR FOLDERS, THEY ARE GOOD BACKUP SOURCES, COPY THEM TO A WRITABLE REMOVABLE DISK, ALSO BACKUP YOUR SAVED GAMES FOLDER, NORMALLY FOUND IN MY DOCUMENTS AFTER A SAVE HAS BEEN MADE.
